text: ¡Heist! is an EP by Boston-based rock group The Lights Out. It was self- released in 2008. All songs were later used to create the band's debut LP Color Machine. ==Track listing== # "Money Or Time" # "Liquid" # "Never Going Back" # "Get Up Get Up" # "New Gets Old" ==References== Category:2008 EPs Category:The Lights Out EPs Category:Self-released EPs
title: ¡Heist!
